message: In that case, you'd need to write your own IProgress<t> implementation. If order is important, you could send it to an Rx stream ([https://gist.github.com/StephenCleary/7330384](https://gist.github.com/StephenCleary/7330384)) or Dataflow Block ([https://github.com/StephenCleary/AsyncEx/wiki/DataflowProgress](https://github.com/StephenCleary/AsyncEx/wiki/DataflowProgress)).
